          <title>
            <string language="en">Fermenters</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gärungserreger</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fermenteurs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fermenters</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fermentatori</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Fermenters</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fermenters</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows the parts of a fermenter used to grow microorganisms. Instruments automatically check if the conditions inside the fermenter stay constant at settings favorable to the growth of the specific microorganism being grown.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cultures</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">automatic measuring instruments</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">biotechnology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fermenters</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">growth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">microorganisms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ph</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sampling tube</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">stirrer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt die Teile eines 
Gärungserregers, der benutzt wird, um Mikroorganismen zu wachsen. 
Instrumente überprüfen automatisch, ob die Bedingungen 
innerhalb des Gärungserregers an den Einstellungen konstant bleiben, 
die zum Wachstum des spezifischen Mikroorganismus vorteilhaft sind, 
der gewachsen wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre les parties d'un fermenteur 
employé pour accroître des micro-organismes. Les instruments 
contrôlent automatiquement si les conditions à l'intérieur du 
fermenteur restent constantes aux configurations favorables à la 
croissance du micro-organisme spécifique étant accru.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra as partes de um fermenter 
usado crescer microorganisms. Os instrumentos verificam 
automaticamente se as condições dentro do fermenter permanecerem 
constantes nos ajustes favoráveis ao crescimento do microorganism 
específico que está sendo crescido.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra le parti di un fermentatore 
usato per sviluppare i microorganismi. Gli strumenti controllano
automaticamente se i termini all'interno del fermentatore rimangono 
costanti alle regolazioni favorevoli allo sviluppo del microorganismo 
specifico che è cresciuto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει τα μέρη fermenter που 
χρησιμοποιείται για να αυξηθεί τους μικροοργανισμούς. Τα 
όργανα ελέγχουν αυτόματα εάν οι όροι μέσα fermenter μένουν 
σταθεροί στις τιμές των παραμέτρων ευνοϊκές στην αύξηση του 
ανάπτυξης του συγκεκριμένου μικροοργανισμού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra las partes de un fermenter 
usado para crecer microorganismos. Los instrumentos controlan 
automáticamente si las condiciones dentro del fermenter permanecen 
constantes en las configuraciones favorables al crecimiento del 
microorganismo específico que es crecido.</string>
          </description>
